nodes.text: Black Gabaki was a type of mushroom that grew on the north side of trees on the planet Toydaria. It could be used to produced Neutron Pixie, a type of spice. Like Grey Gabaki, Black Gabaki grew from the droppings of shaoryn.
The mushroom needed to be flash-frozen immediately after harvesting. If it was not, it would quickly turn stale and gray.
